purpose.summary: This is a Database Definition (DBD) source file for the IMS hierarchical database named DBPAUTX0. It defines an indexed VSAM-protected database with a single dataset group DSG001 mapped to DDPAUTX0 and one root segment PAUTINDX of 6 bytes containing a unique packed sequence key field INDXSEQ. The PAUTINDX segment establishes a logical child (LCHILD) relationship to the PAUTSUM0 segment in the DBPAUTP0 database via the ACCNTID index.

inputs.name: DDPAUTX0
inputs.description: Physical dataset for storing the DBPAUTX0 IMS database segments

outputs.name: DDPAUTX0
outputs.description: Physical dataset for storing the DBPAUTX0 IMS database segments (read/write access implied by VSAM INDEX access method)

business_rules.description: The INDXSEQ field serves as a unique sequence key for the PAUTINDX root segment
business_rules.logic_summary: Defined as SEQ,U (sequence, unique) packed field starting at position 1
